Jerry.proposed_response: Nice! What kinds of boats do you like—sailboats, fishing boats, or speedboats?
Jerry.rationale: Casual, non-urgent topic; a brief question keeps the conversation flowing.

chad.proposed_response: Do you mean sports balls? Which ones are your favorite?
chad.rationale: Casual, non-urgent message. The reply clarifies the ambiguous statement and steers the conversation to a neutral topic.

john.proposed_response: Hey John, just following up on my last note—I’m really into boats. Are you into them too? Any favorites?
john.rationale: Casual, non-time-sensitive topic; a polite nudge after no response is appropriate without urgency.
